Open Data Book Club

Promoting Open Data on PEI

(a project by PEI Developers)

What is it?

A regular meetup for civic-minded individuals to present / discuss open data. We won’t be studying books: we’ll study data sets. Check out this site for more information.

We aim to include government actors (the blue shirts!), map geeks, librarians, software nerds, statisticans, engaged citizens – anyone who is interested in Open Data and its potential on PEI.

Why PEI?

Inspired by a lightning talk at CODS15, some members of PEI Developers would like to join Ottawa, Montreal, and Toronto with a similar venture.

When

Our first meeting is September 22, 2015.

Everyone welcome: the audience is not just software developers!

Just RSVP via MeetUp or send an email to peidevs@gmail.com
